1604.desc: A mysterious Resonator with the power to absorb all sounds. Currently journeying to find their lost memories.

1303.desc: Yuanwu owns a boxing gym where he teaches martial arts and health management. He is well-respected in the community for his cordial demeanor and pleasant temperament.

1105.desc: An artist for hire trying to make a living. Reserved and timid, she is not good with words but speaks volumes through her art, where her creations come to life with impossible authenticity.

1304.desc:
Jinhsi, Magistrate of Jinzhou, gently brightens the hopes of her people, like rays of winter sunlight. 
As the revered Sentinel's Appointed Resonator, she displays humility and wholeheartedly commits herself to guiding her people towards a brilliant future.

1505.desc:
The Shorekeeper, guardian of the Black Shores—this title alone once defined her. 
But desires, bonds, and emotions… She only began to understand these things after meeting you.

1605.desc: A mysterious Resonator with the power to absorb all sounds. Currently journeying to find their lost memories.

1205.nickname: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance.
1205.desc:
Changli is a counselor serving the Jinzhou Magistrate, and former Secretary-General in the capital. 
Shrouded in flames, she's fated to burn brightly until her final embers.
With her fiery determination and strategic mindset, she rises to power, always thinking ahead to reach her ultimate goal.

1104.desc: Lingyang is talented and friendly member of the Liondance Troupe in Jinzhou. His passion and courage are evident as he engages with humans, showcasing his impressive physical abilities. With his unique style, he embodies the spirit of Liondancing.

1203.desc: A girl accompanied by one black and one white Wooly. Encore, consultant from the Black Shores, dreams of creating happy stories with candies, fairy tales, and her imagination.

1302.desc: Yinlin is a skilled Patroller and powerful Natural Resonator. After being suspended from her duties at the Public Security Bureau, she must now pursue hidden evils in secrecy.

1502.desc: A mysterious Resonator with the power to absorb all sounds. Currently journeying to find their lost memories.

1405.desc: Jianxin, a Taoist monk and successor of Fengyiquan, has dedicated her life to mastering the ultimate martial art. With the power to harness and transform environmental Chi, she can create protective barriers that purify both body and mind.

1103.desc:
Baizhi is a researcher in Remnant Ecoacoustics.
Baizhi's once unfulfilled wish has now manifested as her loyal companion. The Remnant Creature You'tan is her source of healing powers, and a lifelong research focus.

1106.desc:
A voluble and whimsical antique appraiser.
Known for creating limericks on the spot, she presents her appraisals with flair and precision. She sets up a stall on the street, ensuring antiques find their way to those who truly cherish them.

1202.desc: Chixia is a spirited young Patroller who lights up the streets of Jinzhou. She's always ready to be the hero someone needs.

1503.desc: With an extensive knowledge of botany, Verina is always solicitous, always smiling, and always wishing for every flower to be blessed with the miracle of life.

1606.desc:
Assistant, prop master, and improv comedian, Roccia is always there to make sure the Fool's Troupe is at the ready.

The Magic Box she carries appears to hold the world, or perhaps she had recreated a world inside the box.

1102.desc:
The bodyguard of Jinzhou’s Magistrate, known for having an icy personality.
Once regarded as the Asura of Calamity, Sanhua is now a taciturn guardian. She has learned to maintain inner calmness amidst the chaotic frequencies, and the things that once frightened her now fuel her determination.

1301.desc: Leader of the "Ghost Hounds," an international mercenary group. Ruthless, vengeful, unforgiving. A potential client must be mindful of the price to pay before making him an offer.

1403.desc: Aalto is an enigmatic Information Broker, known for his elusive nature and welcoming smile. Rumor has it he'll provide any information at the right price.

1601.desc: Taoqi is the director of border defense at the Ministry of Development. Despite her seemingly laid-back demeanor, she consistently proves to be a dependable and supportive individual, always lending her hand to those in need. Taoqi is not only a reliable colleague, but also a trustworthy friend that people can confide in.

1602.desc:
With a vengeful blade of condensed blood in hand, Ranger Danjin hunts down thieves and bandits for retribution. 
She journeys to distant lands in pursuit of justice.

1305.nickname: Error detected. If you have any questions, please contact Customer Service.
1305.desc:
Principal Investigator at Huaxu Academy's Jinzhou Campus, and the Academy's youngest multi-disciplinary scientist. 
A gentle soul with a sharp mind, whose relentless passion for Automata Mechanics always translates into constructive findings and insights.

1204.desc:
Mortefi, a skilled expert in Applied Tacetite Study and a member of the Academy’s Department of Safety, possesses the unique ability to transform his accumulated frustration into fiery flames.
From a burning wrath that consumes all, the red dragon shall descend.

1107.desc:
The second daughter of Montelli and an art investor unbound by convention, Carlotta moves seamlessly through social circles and business transactions while quietly handling the family's unspeakable "troubles" in secret.
The blooming of a "gem," the taking of a life—In her own name, she reshapes reality, giving it a new dimension.

1504.desc:
Navigator at Lollo Logistics and leader of a transport squad team.
Born in a mountain village in Yuezhou, Lumi's sincere and caring nature brings warmth to everyone around her.

1603.desc:
A Bloom Bearer of the Black Shores, Camellya is free-spirited and dangerously charming.
She roams Solaris in search of talent, immersing herself in the present and relishing its pleasures, all while remaining true to herself, unburdened by thoughts of the past or future.

1501.desc: A mysterious Resonator with the power to absorb all sounds. Currently journeying to find their lost memories.

1404.desc: Jiyan, leader of the Midnight Rangers, acts with swift and resolute righteousness. He possesses the formidable ability to conjure a powerful Qingloong from the winds, making him invincible on the battlefield.

1402.desc:
Yangyang is an Outrider of the Midnight Rangers.
Once sheltered, now a fighter. She soars with the wind to protect others, like a skylark in flight.
